app.description: Download files and folders from Mediafire.com

arguments.links: Links to Mediafire files or folders
arguments.inputFile: Path to a text file containing Mediafire links
arguments.inspect: Get detailed information about the provided link without downloading the file. This includes file name, size and other available metadata.
arguments.beautify: Return with a beautify format the data to show for the 'inspect' option.
arguments.headersFile: Path to custom HTTP headers file (raw or JSON format)

errors.inputFileAndArgLink: Cannot use both input file and direct links simultaneously.
errors.extractDetails: Could not extract download link or file name from {{rawLink}}
errors.fetchPureLink: Failed to fetch headers from pure link: {{statusText}}
errors.jsonParsedInvalid: JSON must be an object with key-value pairs

warnings.acceptEncodingMissing: "Accept-Encoding" not specified. Binary files may be corrupted. Recommended: "identity"
warnings.userAgentMissing: "User-Agent" not specified. Some servers may block the request.
warnings.warningQuestion: Do you wish to continue despite the warnings?

messages.exportedHeaders: You can now edit this file and use it with
messages.softwareUseful: Please, if you find this software useful, leave me a star on GitHub
